marklogic.body: You live in a bubble if you think there are men not publishing literature to degrade woman and make them superior yet only based on notions of male ego. We are in a gender war right now. There are woman dragged into the middle of the street and Burned alive in parts of the world. Noses hacked , faces Burnt with acid.... They are considered only to be on earth to bare children, tend a home and be quiet. It's not just about woman in a office trying to be like men, when in fact in many ways as proven we are better then, and shouldn't try to emulate what manners that are less then us. I do not care if the precious male ego is bruised by this reality. Time for the truth to come out. I am not put Off by the differences between men and woman. Woman have so much to feel proud of that is uniquely ours.
